title: Annalakshmi - Central Square
description: Annalakshmi is an Indian vegetarian restaurant founded in Singapore in 1986. The food is cooked and served by volunteers. The traditional Indian vegetarian cuisine is simply presented in a buffet spread and there is no fixed price for the food. The guests pay any amount as he/she wishes. The concept is "Eat What You Want, Give What You Feel, We Believe in You, We Trust You." Nearest MRT station: Clarke Quay (Exit B) or Chinatown (Exit E).
